author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Fix a warning encountered while testing #46821:

> warning: implicitly-declared 'constexpr reco::PhiWedge& reco::PhiWedge::operator=(const reco::PhiWedge&)' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-copy]


#### PR validation:

Code compiles without warnings.


#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backported of #47356 to 15.0.x.
title: Fix warning about implicitly-declared copy constructor [15.0.x]
